Name: Homely Smoke
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
1 barspoon Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Honey and amaretto's rich almond flavours brilliantly balance and marry with cognac and Islay single malt whisky.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2015 by Sam Fraser for the menu at The Lickfold Inn in West Sussex, England
